title: 26 Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday 2024 Sales We Recommend
description: Scan their solid furniture and kitchen deals ASAP
author: Rachel Fletcher
excerpt: Scan their solid furniture and kitchen deals ASAP–even their Athena Calderone pieces are up for grabs while the sale lasts
text: For a one-stop shop to snag all your home deals this season, get yourself on over to the Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday sale for limited-time deals on all things decor, kitchenware, and, of course, furniture. It’s a go-to for our team year round, but we’ve rounded up all the deals that have caught our eye for every room in the home—and they shouldn’t be skipped. You don’t need a promo code, just get your credit card and get moving!Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Home decorWhether you’re looking for a chic sectional sofa, a generous rug, or some trending throw pillows, this is the place to be. We appreciate that Crate has something for everyone on offer—the doors are open for sleek minimalists or those who might prefer a warmer vibe with white oak and natural tones—plus they’ve got all the Christmas decor you need for a more traditional look.Crate & Barrel Elias Natural Elm Wood Open BookcaseCrate & Barrel Edge Extra-Large Silver Arch Floor MirrorCrate & Barrel Organic Cotton Velvet Throw Pillow CoverTom Round Oak Three-Legged Coffee Table by Leanne FordNouveauté 3-Light Floor Lamp by Athena CalderoneMegs Medium Taper Candle Holder by Leanne FordBest Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Bedroom furniture and decorYou can get literally everything you need for the bedroom during the Black Friday sale. From the perfect bed frame to the comforters and bed linens that cover it, you’ll find what you need in some variation. We’ll also point your attention to this extra chic table lamp, a bestseller from their most recent Athena Calderone collaborations.Crate & Barrel Gather Upholstered Queen BedCrate & Barrel Oxford Shirting Organic Cotton Reversible Duvet CoverBest Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Kitchen goodsWhile we can go on for ages about Crate & Barrel’s many decor offerings, we’d be remiss not to highlight their Cyber Monday kitchen sales as well. The retailer stocks cookware from top kitchen brands like OXO, Breville, AllClad and more—the KitchenAid deals especially rival the prices we’re seeing on Amazon and the Le Creuset deals are nothing to sniff at either. Pop in for discounted dinnerware and serve-ware that’ll arrive in time to put on the holiday table.Schott Zwiesel Tour Wine GlassKitchenAid Artisan Series Matte Finish Stand MixerLe Creuset Round Wide Dutch OvenDe'Longhi All-in-One Combination Espresso MachineCrate & Barrel Oven-to-Table Oval Serving Platter with Wood StandBest Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: DiningOK aside from the stand out kitchen goods, we think the dining options in the Cyber Monday deals is where this sale really shines. Stock up on designer dining chairs while the prices are low, or invest in some storage where you can hide your silverware and dining plates or display holiday decor in all its glory. The brand is also offering a discount on one of its best-selling dining tables and some really striking accessories. Definitely don’t skip this section of the Cyber Monday sale!Crate & Barrel Tate Walnut Midcentury SideboardCrate & Barrel Tate Walnut Bookcase Bar CabinetCrate & Barrel Hazel Brown Wood Dining ChairCrate & Barrel Yukon Live Edge Acacia Wood Dining TableCrate & Barrel Cantilever CandelabraCeremonie Green Mohair Dining Chair by Athena CalderoneCrate & Barrel Juni Black Ash Dining ChairBest Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Living room furniture & seatingNow, on to the upholstered seating options. Sadly, there aren’t a ton of sofa options on sale in the living room seating category this time around. We were hoping that would change by the time Cyber Monday arrived but it doesn’t look like that’s happening for us (we were really holding out for our beloved Petrie sofa to hit the markdowns!). Thankfully, the options that are on sale are quite good, well constrcuted, and very customizable. The Retreat, for example, comes in a variety of sizes, material options, and colorways. You can get this neutral shape from something as small as an armchair all the way up to a four-piece sectional sofa that seats upwards of seven people. The sale only applies to some of the sizes and materials, so be careful when checking out that you don’t fall in love with a sofa that is not included in the Cyber Monday sale.Crate & Barrel Gather Deep SofaCrate & Barrel Retreat 2-Piece Chaise Sectional SofaBest Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Crate & KidsWe love love love the kid furniture and accessories at Crate & Kids—we’ve even shopped some of it for ourselves (who says grown-ups can’t have fun with their decor too?). From their collaborations with star designers like Leanne Ford and Jennie Lind to their super cute storage options, lots of options are on sale for the little ones right now—including toys and other lovely gift ideas, like toys of course.Crate&kids Wooden Kids Art EaselCrate&kids Classic Wood Convertible Baby CribJenny Lind Maple Wood Square Kids Play TableCrate&kids Dot Sherpa Storage Ottoman
html:
For a one-stop shop to snag all your home deals this season, get yourself on over to the Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday sale for limited-time deals on all things decor, kitchenware, and, of course, furniture. It’s a go-to for our team year round, but we’ve rounded up all the deals that have caught our eye for every room in the home—and they shouldn’t be skipped. You don’t need a promo code, just get your credit card and get moving!

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Home decor

Whether you’re looking for a chic sectional sofa, a generous rug, or some trending throw pillows, this is the place to be. We appreciate that Crate has something for everyone on offer—the doors are open for sleek minimalists or those who might prefer a warmer vibe with white oak and natural tones—plus they’ve got all the Christmas decor you need for a more traditional look.

Crate & Barrel Elias Natural Elm Wood Open Bookcase

Crate & Barrel Edge Extra-Large Silver Arch Floor Mirror

Crate & Barrel Organic Cotton Velvet Throw Pillow Cover

Tom Round Oak Three-Legged Coffee Table by Leanne Ford

Nouveauté 3-Light Floor Lamp by Athena Calderone

Megs Medium Taper Candle Holder by Leanne Ford

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Bedroom furniture and decor

You can get literally everything you need for the bedroom during the Black Friday sale. From the perfect bed frame to the comforters and bed linens that cover it, you’ll find what you need in some variation. We’ll also point your attention to this extra chic table lamp, a bestseller from their most recent Athena Calderone collaborations.

Crate & Barrel Gather Upholstered Queen Bed

Crate & Barrel Oxford Shirting Organic Cotton Reversible Duvet Cover

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Kitchen goods

While we can go on for ages about Crate & Barrel’s many decor offerings, we’d be remiss not to highlight their Cyber Monday kitchen sales as well. The retailer stocks cookware from top kitchen brands like OXO, Breville, AllClad and more—the KitchenAid deals especially rival the prices we’re seeing on Amazon and the Le Creuset deals are nothing to sniff at either. Pop in for discounted dinnerware and serve-ware that’ll arrive in time to put on the holiday table.

Schott Zwiesel Tour Wine Glass

KitchenAid Artisan Series Matte Finish Stand Mixer

Le Creuset Round Wide Dutch Oven

De'Longhi All-in-One Combination Espresso Machine

Crate & Barrel Oven-to-Table Oval Serving Platter with Wood Stand

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Dining

OK aside from the stand out kitchen goods, we think the dining options in the Cyber Monday deals is where this sale really shines. Stock up on designer dining chairs while the prices are low, or invest in some storage where you can hide your silverware and dining plates or display holiday decor in all its glory. The brand is also offering a discount on one of its best-selling dining tables and some really striking accessories. Definitely don’t skip this section of the Cyber Monday sale!

Crate & Barrel Tate Walnut Midcentury Sideboard

Crate & Barrel Tate Walnut Bookcase Bar Cabinet

Crate & Barrel Hazel Brown Wood Dining Chair

Crate & Barrel Yukon Live Edge Acacia Wood Dining Table

Crate & Barrel Cantilever Candelabra

Ceremonie Green Mohair Dining Chair by Athena Calderone

Crate & Barrel Juni Black Ash Dining Chair

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Living room furniture & seating

Now, on to the upholstered seating options. Sadly, there aren’t a ton of sofa options on sale in the living room seating category this time around. We were hoping that would change by the time Cyber Monday arrived but it doesn’t look like that’s happening for us (we were really holding out for our beloved Petrie sofa to hit the markdowns!). Thankfully, the options that are on sale are quite good, well constrcuted, and very customizable. The Retreat, for example, comes in a variety of sizes, material options, and colorways. You can get this neutral shape from something as small as an armchair all the way up to a four-piece sectional sofa that seats upwards of seven people. The sale only applies to some of the sizes and materials, so be careful when checking out that you don’t fall in love with a sofa that is not included in the Cyber Monday sale.

Crate & Barrel Gather Deep Sofa

Crate & Barrel Retreat 2-Piece Chaise Sectional Sofa

Best Crate & Barrel Cyber Monday Deals: Crate & Kids

We love love love the kid furniture and accessories at Crate & Kids—we’ve even shopped some of it for ourselves (who says grown-ups can’t have fun with their decor too?). From their collaborations with star designers like Leanne Ford and Jennie Lind to their super cute storage options, lots of options are on sale for the little ones right now—including toys and other lovely gift ideas, like toys of course.

Crate&kids Wooden Kids Art Easel

Crate&kids Classic Wood Convertible Baby Crib

Jenny Lind Maple Wood Square Kids Play Table

Crate&kids Dot Sherpa Storage Ottoman
